summary: Home early from their vacation, a wealthy Pacific Palisades family discovers a pair of homeless young drifters who were squatting in their home.
cast: Gabriella Wilde|Thomas Dekker|Richard Dreyfuss|Lolita Davidovich|Luke Grimes|Andrew Howard|Evan Ross|Nancy Travis|Brent Briscoe|Benjamin Adams|Joseph Melendez|John Lacy|Carla Jimenez|Harmon Jones|Gia Mantegna|Mimi Kennedy|James Shanklin|Darrell Britt-Gibson|Wally Rudolph|Vonte|Gregory Cupoli|Ian Alda|Lewis T. Powell|Alex Duong|Chris Williams|Dionne Gipson|Jerome Ro Brooks|Patrick Cohen|David Hoffman|Ashleigh Falls|Cassandra Cruz|Laura Bryce|Xingu Del Rosario|Mark Casimir Dyniewicz Jr.|Winston James Francis|Liana Mendoza
title: Intrusos
